mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.member_id as memberId, c.product_id as productId, c.quantity, p.name, p.price, p.stock from cart c inner join products p on c.product_id = p.id where c.member_id = #{shopUserId} and product_id = #{productsId}
select product_id from cart where member_id = #{userId}
select thumbnail_url as imageSrc, name as itemName, price from products p inner join cart c on p.id = c.id where c.member_id = #{userId}
